channel.title: json on Rafael Leyva Ruiz
channel.description: Recent content in json on Rafael Leyva Ruiz

item.title: 05 - JSON magic with VIM
item.description: How to edit, compare, and pretty format JSONs only with VIM (and maybe some other CLI tool) I have been comparing multiple versions of the same JSON file in my daily workflow, having to edit it and converting it from one line to pretty and vice-versa. For that purpose, I was copying the JSON to a website called JSON formatter and validator (There are hundreds of sites with the same objective around in the internet) and then comparing it to his also prettified version using JSON diff.
